actionCalls.name: myRule_10_A1
actionCalls.label: Notification for Focus/Nationwide channel comms partner owner changed

actionCalls.name: myRule_13_A1
actionCalls.label: Convert Trial To Full Partner Account

rules.name: myRule_13
rules.label: Opp Closed Won-Convert Trial To Full Partner Account

rules.name: myRule_6
rules.label: Account Record Type = Partner and Territory Changes

rules.name: myRule_8
rules.label: Account Record Type = Customer and Territory Changes

rules.name: myRule_10
rules.label: Focus Partner&Nationwide partner Channel comms = TRUE

Flow.description: All encompassing PB for triggering on the account object Removing Bypass for Bizible Node as part of SFDC-16457 + SFDC-18768

value.stringValue: OR ( AND([Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Partner', ISNEW()), AND( [Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Partner', NOT(ISCHANGED( [Account].OwnerId )), OR ( ISCHANGED( [Account].State_Code__c ), ISCHANGED( [Account].BillingCountryCode ), ISCHANGED( [Account].Terr_Alignment_Run__c ) ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_6
formulas.expression: OR ( AND({!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'Partner', ISNEW()), AND( {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'Partner', NOT(ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.OwnerId} )), OR ( ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.State_Code__c} ), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.BillingCountryCode} ), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Terr_Alignment_Run__c} ) ) ) )

value.stringValue: OR ( AND(OR([Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Customer', [Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Validation'), ISNEW()), AND( OR([Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Customer', [Account].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Validation'), NOT(ISCHANGED( [Account].OwnerId )), OR ( ISCHANGED( [Account].State_Code__c ), ISCHANGED( [Account].BillingCountryCode ), ISCHANGED( [Account].Employees_Formula__c ), ISCHANGED( [Account].Named_Account__c ), ISCHANGED( [Account].Terr_Alignment_Run__c ) ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_8
formulas.expression: OR ( AND(OR({!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'Customer', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'Validation'), ISNEW()), AND( OR({!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'Customer', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'Validation'), NOT(ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.OwnerId} )), OR ( ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.State_Code__c} ), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.BillingCountryCode} ), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Employees_Formula__c} ), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Named_Account__c} ), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Terr_Alignment_Run__c} ) ) ) )

Flow.label: Account Management - Create/Edit
